decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Document titled 'Report and recommendations' received on 23/09/2013 and an email received at 16:48 on 23/09/2013 regarding render and a report titled 'Scope of works', received on 23/09/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - A sample panel of render to be used on the external surface of the building, showing the composition, texture, finished colour and surface details shall be prepared on site and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to application to the building.

Condition : 4 - No development shall take place until 1:20 scale drawings and samples of the basement window have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.
description: Listed Building Consent for the repair of the frontage of the shop including the replacement and repair of rotten timber beams, replacement of brickwork, replacement of the basement window and repair of the fascia.
